In England, in the seven days to 02 July, there were 141,819 new confirmed cases (252.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 June, there were 84,062 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 69% (57,757 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 July is 4,334,634 (7,701 cases per 100,000 population).
